main event: Two round white objects, the size of a nickel, were observed descending behind Pikes Peak for about 15 minutes.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on August 24, 1957, between 1820 and 1835 hours., The objects were observed by military personnel at Peterson Field., Venus and Jupiter were mentioned in the comments about the sighting., One object was below the other during the observation., The sighting lasted approximately 15 minutes and had a bobbing motion.
